general.saveUp: Save up to 70% on your shipping costs. No fixed fees, no minimum shipping volume required. Manage all your shipments in a single platform.
general.noContract: No contract needed! More than 300 transport services into a single platform. You can connect all your ecommerce and manage all your shipments in ACME.

login.connectYourService:
Connect your service using your key. You'll find it in the
"ACME API Key" section of the "Settings".

register.termsAndConditions: I accept the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy of ACME
register.marketingEmails: I authorise ACME Shipping S.L. to send me commercial communications by e-mail

orderStatusMapping.description:
With ACME you can update your %s order status with shipping information.
You can edit it at any time.

shippingServices.pricePolicyDescription: The default will be ACME's basic prices. But you can configure these in a more precise way below.
shippingServices.useAcmeRange: For all other ranges, apply ACME prices

orderListAndDetails.draftIsBeingCreated: Draft is currently being created in ACME

autoTest.useThisPageTestConfiguration: Use this page to test the system configuration and ACME module services.
